channel.title: Home on Krystian's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Krystian's Blog

item.title: Develop a website just like this - easily and quickly
item.description: Outline HUGO is an amazing tool allowing you to get a site up and running in a matter of hours (even for a begginer). The way it does this is by taking your selected theme and compiling the HTML files for you. This article will show you how to do just that. We will follow a few basic steps: Install HUGO Download a theme suited to your project Customise the theme Add your content Deploy the website Do bare in mind that this is the high-level overview of the project.

item.title: Contact me
item.description: If you are interested in working with me, try the following: Email krystianbucko@outlook.com krystian.bucko@madetech.com Social Linkedin - https://www.linkedin.com/in/krystian-bucko/ I’m happy to hear from you about work, projects, questions, or whatever else sits on your mind ;)
